samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example demonstrates the default functionalities of the Vue drop-down list component with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Grouping and Icons
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to group based on the different categories with individual header and icon support using Vue drop-down list component.

samples.name: Data Binding
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to bind with local data source and fetch data from remote data service in the Vue drop-down list component.

samples.name: Template
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to customize the appearance of each item in the Vue drop-down list component pop-up list using the template.

samples.name: Virtualization
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to utilize the virtual scrolling support of Vue drop-down list component.

samples.name: Filtering
samples.description: This example demonstrates how the filtering functionalities works based on the typed characters in the Vue drop-down list component.

samples.name: Cascading
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to create a related drop-down list (Cascading DropDownList) using the Vue drop-down list component.

samples.name: Inline
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to render the Vue drop-down list component in line with highlighted contents.

samples.name: Diacritics Filtering
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to achieve the diacritics filter functionalities in the Vue drop-down list component.

samples.name: Two-way Binding
samples.description: The Vue Dropdown List component supports two-way data binding using the v-model attribute of Vue directive. It helps to achieve in sync with data in the DOM.
